description: MOSCOW - Russia and China are considering putting a nuclear power unit on the Moon around 2033-35, Yuri Borisov, the head of Russia's space agency Roscosmos said on Tuesday, the RIA state news agency reported. REUTERS Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Russia and China are considering putting a nuclear power unit on the Moon -RIA
title_page: Russia and China are considering putting a nuclear power unit on the Moon -RIA | The Straits Times
maintext: MOSCOW - Russia and China are considering putting a nuclear power unit on the Moon around 2033-35, Yuri Borisov, the head of Russia's space agency Roscosmos said on Tuesday, the RIA state news agency reported. REUTERS
